location.text:
::U5 p54 6.1 Passive::[html]People expect tourists to carry sticks to protect themselves from curious monkeys.
ARE
Tourists {=are expected to carry =are expected to carry} sticks to protect themselves from curious monkeys.

stem.text:
People expect tourists to carry sticks to protect themselves from curious monkeys.
ARE
Tourists _____ sticks to protect themselves from curious monkeys.

location.text:
::U5 p54 6.2 Passive::[html]Most people think monkeys are a huge tourist attraction. BE
Monkeys {=are thought to be} a huge tourist attraction by most people.

stem.text:
Most people think monkeys are a huge tourist attraction. BE
Monkeys _____ a huge tourist attraction by most people.

location.text:
::U5 p54 6.3 Passive::[html]Newspapers claim that twenty top chefs have been invited to prepare the meal. BY
It {=is claimed by} newspapers that twenty top chefs have been invited
to prepare the meal.

stem.text:
Newspapers claim that twenty top chefs have been invited to prepare the meal. BY
It _____ newspapers that twenty top chefs have been invited
to prepare the meal.

location.text:
::U5 p54 6.4 Passive::[html]The tourist office has estimated that over 10,000 visitors watch the feast. BEEN
It {=has been estimated} that over 10,000 visitors watch the feast.

stem.text:
The tourist office has estimated that over 10,000 visitors watch the feast. BEEN
It _____ that over 10,000 visitors watch the feast.

location.text:
::U5 p54 6.5 Passive::[html]Everyone says monkeys can be very aggressive around food. TO
Monkeys {=are said to} be very aggressive around food.

stem.text:
Everyone says monkeys can be very aggressive around food. TO
Monkeys _____ be very aggressive around food.
